column1: This light-hearted video from Delaware Valley Community Health makes a good point: the simple step of washing your hands is one of our best weapons against Covid and flu. Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/Ahos47ND1T
Americans need more Covid relief now!   It should include funding for testing tracing & treatment as the House-passed Heroes Act does. https://t.co/Su6dBQssbu

This is correct: “Getting coronavirus vaccines to communities of color is especially important because those communities have disproportionately borne the burden of the pandemic.” I recently wrote about bridging the trust gap: https://t.co/yEp7h25Dg8 https://t.co/sMIrp53VJC
